user_instruction: 'Provide a thoughtful response to Professor Harrison'"'"'s (mark.harrison@university.edu) inquiry about student engagement in our classes. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Your Insights on Boosting Student Engagement

Hi Jane,

I hope your week is going well. I’m currently compiling a set of strategies to improve student engagement across our classes and would greatly value your experience.

Could you share any notes, data, or reflections you’ve gathered on the engagement techniques you used this term? If these are already stored in our shared Notion workspace, please just point me to the relevant pages. Likewise, if there are helpful email threads or calendar events with pertinent details, please let me know so I can review them.

Thank you in advance for your time and insights.

Best regards,  
Mark

final_output:
Subject: Request for Your Insights on Boosting Student Engagement

Hi Jane,

I hope your week is going well. I’m currently compiling a set of strategies to improve student engagement across our classes and would greatly value your experience.

Could you share any notes, data, or reflections you’ve gathered on the engagement techniques you used this term? If these are already stored in our shared Notion workspace, please just point me to the relevant pages. Likewise, if there are helpful email threads or calendar events with pertinent details, please let me know so I can review them.

Thank you in advance for your time and insights.

Best regards,  
Mark
